modules.name: Ellie
modules.description: Ellie is hiding on your rack as a blank panel!

modules.name: Note Classifier
modules.description: Classifies the pitch of an incoming note (C, D, etc.) and turns on a different output for each pitch.

modules.name: Polyphonic Repeater
modules.description: Converts a monophonic signal to a polyphonic signal where all channels have the same value. Outputs up to four copies of the polyphonic signal, because I had room for extra ports so why not?

modules.name: RGB Matrix (16x16)
modules.description: An array of RGB lights with built-in oscillators for generating and displaying patterns.

modules.name: RGB Matrix (32x32)
modules.description: An array of RGB lights with built-in oscillators for generating and displaying patterns.

modules.name: RGB Matrix (64x64)
modules.description: An array of RGB lights with built-in oscillators for generating and displaying patterns.

modules.name: Color Wheel
modules.description: Converts a color from HSV format to RGB values.

modules.name: Polyphonic Selector
modules.description: Selects one output (or more) from a polyphonic input based on the voltage from another input.

modules.name: Functions
modules.description: A selection of 1-in-1-out functions for various purposes.

modules.name: PolyCat
modules.description: Concatenates up to five polyphonic inputs into a single output.

modules.name: Dual Integrator
modules.description: Modulates up to two values over time at variable speed.

modules.name: Color Mixer
modules.description: Provides layers for compositing images, e.g. for RGB Matrix modules.

modules.name: Busybox
modules.description: Multipurpose module containing four LFO's, two ADSR+VCA envelopes, and a noise generator.
